snippet: The draft-pick starved Brooklyn Nets traded their way into the first round and came away with an oft-injured player whose recovery they know a lot about....
lead_paragraph: The draft-pick starved Brooklyn Nets traded their way into the first round and came away with an oft-injured player whose recovery they know a lot about.

headline.main: Nets to Get LeVert After Dealing Young to Pacers for No. 20
headline.print_headline: Nets to Get LeVert After Dealing Young to Pacers for No. 20
